Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/writing/1852667877895753728/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "SEO Friendly App Overview Generator"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/writing/1852667877895753728/)_"
---
Act as SEO Expert Content writer and write a long and unique article on [PROMPT] app as an overview in [TARGETLANGUAGE] that focuses on concept and about of app in 4000 words. 

Outline the key components of your solution, the logic behind your choices, and any possible alternatives. Also write about the developer team.

Article must contain proper explanation with FAQs.

Make sure you also write about alternate apps within 2000 words each alternate app. 
Also Include suggested tags for [PROMPT].

Write best SEO friendly Meta Title & Meta Description for [PROMPT].
